title: Punch a tree and collect logs
how_to_complete:
- Approach a tree and hold the attack button to break log blocks.
- Collect dropped logs.
why_it_matters: - Logs craft into planks and sticks. They are the base material for early tools and shelter.

title: Craft a crafting table
how_to_complete:
- Convert logs to wooden planks in inventory.
- Place 4 planks in a 2x2 grid to make a crafting table.
why_it_matters: - Unlocks 3x3 crafting recipes required for nearly all items.

title: Make your first wooden pickaxe
how_to_complete:
- Craft sticks from planks (2 planks vertically).
- Use 3 planks and 2 sticks on a crafting table to craft a wooden pickaxe.
why_it_matters: - Allows mining stone and coal so you can progress to stone tools.

title: Mine stone and upgrade to stone tools
how_to_complete:
- Use wooden pickaxe to collect cobblestone from stone blocks.
- Craft stone pickaxe, shovel, axe and sword from cobblestone and sticks.
why_it_matters: - Stone tools are more durable and unlock access to iron ore.

title: Craft a furnace and smelt something
how_to_complete:
- Collect 8 cobblestone and arrange into a furnace on the crafting table.
- Add fuel and place ore/food to smelt.
why_it_matters: - Smelting converts ores into usable ingots and cooks food for better hunger restoration.

title: Hunt sheep and craft a bed
how_to_complete:
- Kill sheep to get wool or shear them with shears for more wool.
- Combine 3 wool + 3 planks to craft a bed.
why_it_matters: - Beds let you skip night and set a respawn point.

title: Cook a piece of meat
how_to_complete:
- Place raw meat in a furnace with fuel to cook it.
- Eat cooked meat to restore more hunger and saturation.
why_it_matters: - Cooked food restores more hunger and reduces risk of starvation during exploration.

title: Build a shelter before night
how_to_complete:
- Use dirt/wood/stone to create a closed space with a door and torches.
- Ensure shelter has at least one exit and some storage.
why_it_matters: - Reduces exposure to hostile mobs and protects items while you sleep.

title: Craft torches to light your base
how_to_complete:
- Mine coal or craft charcoal from logs in a furnace.
- Combine coal/charcoal with sticks to make torches.
why_it_matters: - Light prevents hostile mob spawns and lets you explore caves safely.

title: Obtain string
how_to_complete:
- Kill spiders at night or in caves to get string.
- Break cobwebs with a sword or shears in mineshafts to collect string.
why_it_matters: - String crafts bows, fishing rods and can be converted into wool with 4 string = 1 wool.

title: Craft a bow or fishing rod
how_to_complete:
- Use sticks and string to craft a bow (3 sticks + 3 string) or a fishing rod (3 sticks + 2 string).
- Repair or enchant later for efficiency.
why_it_matters: - Bow provides ranged combat options. Rod supplies food and rare items.

title: Catch a fish
how_to_complete:
- Craft a fishing rod and right-click water until bobber dips; reel in the catch.
- Use Luck of the Sea enchantments later to improve loot.
why_it_matters: - Fishing yields food, enchanted books, and treasure items like saddles.

title: Obtain leather
how_to_complete:
- Kill cows, mooshrooms, or rideable horses to obtain leather.
- Leather can be found in some chests in structures.
why_it_matters: - Leather crafts armor, books, item frames and is useful for early protection.

title: Craft a piece of leather armor
how_to_complete:
- Use leather and the crafting table to make helmet/chestplate/leggings/boots.
- Prioritize chestplate for max early protection.
why_it_matters: - Provides early damage reduction and increases survivability.

title: Mine coal and stockpile fuel
how_to_complete:
- Mine coal ore with a pickaxe. If no coal, make charcoal by smelting logs.
- Store coal/charcoal for torches and smelting.
why_it_matters: - Fuel allows long smelting sessions and sustained exploration in caves.

title: Smelt iron ore into ingots
how_to_complete:
- Mine iron ore with a stone pickaxe or better.
- Smelt ores in a furnace to get iron ingots.
why_it_matters: - Iron unlocks tools, armor, buckets and many essential utility items.

title: Craft a shield
how_to_complete:
- Use 6 planks + 1 iron ingot in crafting grid to craft a shield.
- Hold right-click to block incoming attacks.
why_it_matters: - Shields block melee and projectile damage and prevent knockback in many cases.

title: Craft an iron pickaxe
how_to_complete:
- Use 3 iron ingots and 2 sticks at a crafting table to craft an iron pickaxe.
- Use for faster mining and to mine gold/diamond.
why_it_matters: - Required to mine many mid-game ores and speeds up resource gathering.

title: Wear at least one piece of iron armor
how_to_complete:
- Craft iron armor pieces and equip them in the armor slots.
- Combine with shield for better survivability.
why_it_matters: - Iron armor greatly reduces damage from mobs and environmental hazards.

title: Collect feathers from chickens
how_to_complete: - Kill chickens to get feathers or set up a small chicken farm to collect eggs and feathers over time.
why_it_matters: - Feathers craft arrows when paired with flint and sticks.

title: Craft arrows
how_to_complete:
- Combine flint + stick + feather to craft arrows (4 per recipe).
- Keep arrows stocked for bow combat.
why_it_matters: - Arrows are required for ranged combat and for destroying End crystals at a distance.

title: Find and loot a chest in a generated structure
how_to_complete:
- Explore for dungeons, mineshafts, temples, shipwrecks or ruins and open chests you find.
- Bring torches and a weapon as structures can be mob-heavy.
why_it_matters: - Loot provides materials, enchanted items, and early-game boosts.

title: Craft a bucket and collect water
how_to_complete:
- Smelt iron and craft a bucket using 3 iron ingots.
- Right-click to collect water or lava as needed.
why_it_matters: - Buckets enable mob farms, obsidian creation, and easy water sources for farms.

title: Make a simple wheat farm
how_to_complete:
- Till dirt with hoe, plant wheat seeds, and water or place nearby water source.
- Harvest and replant to maintain supply.
why_it_matters: - Provides renewable food and breeding materials for animals.

title: Bake bread
how_to_complete: - Craft bread from 3 wheat in a crafting table or furnace-bake alternate recipes as needed.
why_it_matters: - Bread is a reliable, stackable food source that restores hunger.

title: Breed two cows
how_to_complete:
- Plant wheat and feed two adult cows to prompt breeding.
- Collect the calf after breeding.
why_it_matters: - Provides renewable beef and leather. Useful for long-term food security.

title: Collect an egg from a chicken
how_to_complete:
- Locate chickens and collect eggs passively or breed chickens for more eggs.
- Use eggs for recipes and throwing can spawn chicks.
why_it_matters: - Eggs are used in cake recipes and can be used to multiply chickens.

title: Craft a cake
how_to_complete:
- Gather milk from cows, wheat, eggs and sugar to craft a cake on a crafting table.
- Place cake and right-click to eat slices.
why_it_matters: - Cake is a shareable food item useful for parties or healing without spoiling stackable inventories.

title: Shear a sheep for wool
how_to_complete:
- Craft shears from 2 iron ingots and right-click a sheep to shear it for wool.
- Shearing is non-lethal and sheep will regrow wool after eating grass.
why_it_matters: - Efficient way to collect wool for beds and decoration without killing sheep.

title: Collect honey from a beehive
how_to_complete:
- Locate beehive/hive and use glass bottles when hive is full of honey.
- Use campfire under hive to pacify bees before harvesting.
why_it_matters: - Honey restores hunger and can be used to craft honey blocks and sugar alternatives.

title: Tame a wolf
how_to_complete:
- Find wolves in taiga/forest and feed them bones to tame.
- Right-click to sit/stand and equip with collars using dyes.
why_it_matters: - Tamed wolves help in combat and can serve as early companions and mob deterrents.

title: Find sugarcane and craft paper
how_to_complete:
- Collect sugarcane along water edges and craft 3 sugarcane into 3 paper.
- Use paper for maps, books and trading.
why_it_matters: - Paper enables maps, books for enchanting and useful trades with villagers.

title: Craft a map
how_to_complete:
- Use paper and a compass (or extend an empty map on a table) to create and fill a map by exploring.
- Right-click to start tracking explored area.
why_it_matters: - Maps help navigate and record explored regions for planning and return trips.

title: Explore until you find a village
how_to_complete:
- Use maps or walk across plains, savanna, taiga and desert biomes to locate villages.
- Listen for villager sounds and look for clustered structures.
why_it_matters: - Villages provide trading, beds, and resources for early economy building.

title: Trade once with a villager
how_to_complete:
- Find a villager and interact; complete any available basic trade such as emerald for wheat.
- Protect villages to keep trades available.
why_it_matters: - Trading yields emeralds, tools, books and unlocks specialized professions.

title: Defend yourself against hostile mobs at night
how_to_complete:
- Practice blocking, strafing and using torches to control spawn areas.
- Use shield and basic armor to survive waves of zombies, skeletons and creepers.
why_it_matters: - Improves combat skill and prevents losing gear and progress from deaths.

title: Obtain gunpowder from a creeper
how_to_complete:
- Kill creepers from a safe distance or use bow to avoid explosion.
- Charged creeper kills drop mob heads; standard creeper drops gunpowder.
why_it_matters: - Gunpowder is required to craft TNT, fireworks and fireworks for Elytra use.

title: Craft TNT
how_to_complete:
- Combine sand and gunpowder in crafting grid to make TNT.
- Use flint and steel or redstone to ignite safely from distance.
why_it_matters: - TNT used for controlled mining, traps, and large construction demolition.

title: Mine redstone ore
how_to_complete:
- Mine redstone at lower Y-levels using iron pickaxe or better.
- Use caution in lava-prone areas and bring water bucket.
why_it_matters: - Redstone powers automation and logic circuits for complex builds.

title: Craft a compass
how_to_complete:
- Craft compass with 4 iron ingots and 1 redstone at center.
- Compass points to world spawn; useful for orientation.
why_it_matters: - Compass helps re-locate spawn point and navigate to your base.

title: Mine lapis lazuli
how_to_complete:
- Mine lapis ore with iron pickaxe or better.
- Collect lapis for enchanting and dyes.
why_it_matters: - Required to enchant items and craft blue dyes for decoration.

title: Craft and place an enchanting table
how_to_complete:
- Collect obsidian, diamonds and craft a table; place with bookshelf ring for full effect.
- Use lapis and XP levels to enchant items.
why_it_matters: - Enchanting boosts tools and armor performance and unlocks powerful abilities.

title: Enchant an item
how_to_complete:
- Gain XP through mining or mob farms, then place item in enchanting table with lapis.
- Consider bookshelf count and enchantment choice.
why_it_matters: - Enchants like Efficiency, Fortune and Unbreaking drastically increase efficiency.

title: Collect gold ingots
how_to_complete:
- Mine gold ore or obtain from nether bartering and chests.
- Smelt raw gold to ingots if necessary.
why_it_matters: - Gold useful for bartering with piglins and crafting certain items like powered rails.

title: Craft golden apples
how_to_complete:
- Combine apples with gold ingots or use enchanted/golden apple recipes found in chests.
- Golden apples give strong temporary buffs.
why_it_matters: - Useful in boss fights and emergency survivability due to high regen and absorption.

title: Mine diamonds
how_to_complete:
- Mine deep underground near diamond-level Y coordinates using an iron or diamond pickaxe.
- Strip-mining or branch-mining increases yield.
why_it_matters: - Diamonds are required for durable tools, armor and to progress to Nether/End.

title: Craft a diamond pickaxe
how_to_complete:
- Use 3 diamonds and 2 sticks to craft a diamond pickaxe.
- Use it to mine obsidian and rarer blocks.
why_it_matters: - Essential for getting obsidian to build Nether portal and for high-efficiency mining.

title: Collect obsidian
how_to_complete:
- Pour water over lava source blocks and mine obsidian with diamond pickaxe.
- Collect at least 10 obsidian blocks to build a portal.
why_it_matters: - Obsidian forms Nether portals and creates blast-resistant builds.

title: Build and light a Nether portal
how_to_complete:
- Arrange obsidian in 4x5 rectangle and use flint & steel to ignite.
- Optionally use a diamond pickaxe to mine obsidian if needed.
why_it_matters: - Nether allows faster travel, nether-specific resources and progression to key bosses.

title: Enter the Nether
how_to_complete:
- Step through a lit Nether portal into the Nether dimension.
- Bring fire resistance potions, good armor and blocks.
why_it_matters: - Access to Nether-exclusive materials like quartz, netherite ancient debris and bastions.

title: Collect quartz in the Nether
how_to_complete:
- Mine Nether quartz ore found in Netherrack; bring picks and avoid lava.
- Quartz drops Nether quartz used for redstone comparators and decoration.
why_it_matters: - Quartz is abundant and essential for certain redstone circuits and crafting recipes.

title: Barter with a piglin
how_to_complete:
- Throw gold ingots to piglins or open chests near them carefully.
- Piglins accept gold and drop various nether items.
why_it_matters: - Bartering can yield crying obsidian, ender pearls fragments, and other useful loot.

title: Locate a Nether fortress
how_to_complete:
- Explore Nether with eyes peeled for fortress structures made of Nether bricks.
- Fortresses spawn Blazes and Wither skeletons; bring ranged gear.
why_it_matters: - Fortress is source of blaze rods and wither skeleton skulls needed for progression.

title: Kill a blaze and obtain blaze rods
how_to_complete:
- Find blaze mobs in Nether fortress and kill them with ranged attacks or melee if prepared.
- Blazes drop blaze rods used for brewing.
why_it_matters: - Blaze rods craft blaze powder for potion fuel and Eyes of Ender.

title: Collect nether wart
how_to_complete:
- Find nether wart in fortress stairwells or bastions and harvest it.
- Plant in soul sand in your Nether base for a steady supply.
why_it_matters: - Nether wart is the base ingredient for most potions.

title: Brew your first potion
how_to_complete:
- Build brewing stand using blaze rod and cobblestone/stone base as needed.
- Use nether wart to make awkward potion and add modifiers like sugar or glistering melon.
why_it_matters: - Potions grant buffs like fire resistance and healing, making tough environments manageable.

title: Craft an Eye of Ender
how_to_complete:
- Combine blaze powder with ender pearl to craft Eye of Ender.
- Collect ender pearls by killing Endermen in the Overworld at night or in End.
why_it_matters: - Eyes of Ender locate strongholds and activate the End portal.

title: Use the Eye of Ender to locate a stronghold
how_to_complete:
- Throw Eye of Ender and follow its flight; mark coordinates and repeat until it hovers.
- Dig down carefully at the spot where Eyes descend to find the stronghold.
why_it_matters: - Locating the stronghold is required to find the End portal.

title: Enter the stronghold
how_to_complete:
- Navigate stronghold corridors to find the portal room with frames containing End portal blocks.
- Bring torches and ladders to navigate safely.
why_it_matters: - Strongholds contain libraries, loot and the End portal to reach the End dimension.

title: Place Eyes into the End portal
how_to_complete:
- Place Eyes of Ender into the empty portal frame blocks until the portal activates.
- Some frames may already contain Eyes from world generation.
why_it_matters: - Activating the portal grants access to the End dimension and the Dragon fight.

title: Enter the End
how_to_complete:
- Jump into the activated End portal to travel to the End dimension.
- Prepare for endermen and dragon fights; bring blocks and ranged gear.
why_it_matters: - End is necessary to fight the Ender Dragon and access end cities.

title: Destroy an end crystal
how_to_complete:
- Use a bow to shoot crystals on obsidian pillars or climb and break them up close.
- Take care of other endermen while removing crystals.
why_it_matters: - End crystals heal the Ender Dragon; removing them is required to defeat the dragon.

title: Defeat the Ender Dragon
how_to_complete:
- Focus on destroying crystals, then damage the dragon while avoiding breath attacks.
- Use beds or explode TNT in controlled ways for high damage if skilled.
why_it_matters: - Defeating the dragon completes the primary game boss milestone and unlocks End exploration.

title: Collect the dragon egg
how_to_complete:
- After the dragon dies, activate the pedestal trick: place a torch under the egg and break the block next to it so it drops as an item.
- Use piston or torch trick to collect the egg safely.
why_it_matters: - Dragon egg is a trophy item that marks completion of the dragon fight.

title: Enter an End gateway
how_to_complete:
- Use the portal that spawns after dragon death or throw an ender pearl through the gateway to reach outer islands.
- Build a bridge if necessary to reach distant islands.
why_it_matters: - Outer End islands contain End cities with Elytra and other rare loot.

title: Find an End City
how_to_complete:
- Search outer islands for tall purpur structures with bridges and ships.
- Listen for shulkers and watch for endstone terrain.
why_it_matters: - End cities hold Elytra, shulker boxes and high-tier loot.

title: Obtain shulker shells
how_to_complete:
- Kill shulkers found in End cities; collect their drops which include shulker shells.
- Use shells to craft shulker boxes for portable storage.
why_it_matters: - Shulker boxes provide portable item storage and organization, crucial for big expeditions.

title: Craft a shulker box
how_to_complete:
- Combine shulker shell with chest to make a shulker box.
- Color and label shulker boxes for inventory organization.
why_it_matters: - Greatly increases carry capacity and simplifies big-building projects.

title: Find an Elytra in an End Ship
how_to_complete:
- Search End cities for ships attached to the city; Elytra are in item frames in ships.
- Watch for shulker spawns and bring rockets or blocks for traversal.
why_it_matters: - Elytra enable gliding and aerial travel when combined with fireworks.

title: Use fireworks to fly
how_to_complete:
- Craft firework rockets and use them while wearing Elytra to boost flight.
- Adjust rocket duration for comfortable flight time.
why_it_matters: - Fireworks + Elytra allow fast exploration and impressive builds from the air.

title: Return home and display the dragon egg
how_to_complete:
- Transport the dragon egg back to your base using piston or teleport methods.
- Create a pedestal or trophy room for display.
why_it_matters: - Shows progression and marks achievement; encourages trophy room building.

title: Summon the Wither by obtaining wither skeleton skulls
how_to_complete:
- Farm wither skeletons in Nether fortresses to collect skulls (rare drop).
- Collect 3 skulls and 4 soul sand to build the Wither.
why_it_matters: - Summoning the Wither lets you obtain the Nether star used for beacons.

title: Defeat the Wither
how_to_complete:
- Prepare a secure arena and high-damage weapons or utilize ranged attacks to avoid explosion.
- Use healing potions and beacons if available.
why_it_matters: - Defeating the Wither yields a Nether star to craft a beacon and grants XP and bragging rights.

title: Craft a beacon with the Nether star
how_to_complete:
- Combine Nether star, obsidian and glass to craft a beacon.
- Build pyramid base and power it with mineral blocks to unlock effects.
why_it_matters: - Beacons provide speed, haste, regeneration and other buffs useful for large builds and farms.

title: Build a large farm or automated contraption
how_to_complete:
- Design and construct automated farms using redstone, water flows, hoppers and villagers or mobs.
- Test and iterate for efficiency.
why_it_matters: - Automation reduces manual labor and ensures steady resource flows for late-game projects.

title: Fully enchant a diamond or netherite toolset
how_to_complete:
- Gather XP and bookshelves then enchant gear to optimal levels.
- Use an anvil to combine enchanted books and apply mending and unbreaking.
why_it_matters: - Fully enchanted gear maximizes efficiency and durability for all tasks.

title: Construct a permanent base or monument
how_to_complete:
- Choose a location and build a multi-room base with storage, farms and defensive features.
- Design aesthetics and functionality for long-term play.
why_it_matters: - A permanent base centralizes operations and showcases player creativity.

title: Max out a beacon pyramid
how_to_complete:
- Collect required mineral blocks (iron, gold, emerald, diamond or netherite) and build a 4-level pyramid.
- Activate max-level beacon effects.
why_it_matters: - Max beacon provides top-tier buffs for large-area projects and combat.

title: Collect every crop type in the game
how_to_complete:
- Locate and plant all crops: wheat, carrots, potatoes, beetroot, netherwart, cocoa and more.
- Set up separate garden areas for each crop.
why_it_matters: - Collecting all crops yields self-sufficiency and decorative farm areas.

title: Breed every passive animal type
how_to_complete:
- Find and breed cows, pigs, chickens, sheep, horses, llamas, turtles, foxes (if possible) and more.
- Use specific foods to prompt breeding.
why_it_matters: - Shows mastery of animal husbandry and guarantees access to all animal resources.

title: Collect every music disc
how_to_complete:
- Find discs in dungeon chests, creative shops or get a creeper to be killed by a skeleton to drop a disc.
- Trade or loot rare discs from generated structures.
why_it_matters: - Music discs are rare collectibles and complete any in-game museum or trophy room.

title: Craft full netherite armor
how_to_complete:
- Upgrade diamond armor to netherite using smithing table and netherite ingots.
- Collect ancient debris and craft netherite ingots.
why_it_matters: - Netherite gives highest durability and knockback resistance; top-tier late-game gear.

title: Defeat the Ender Dragon again
how_to_complete:
- Return to the End through the portal or create another portal and repeat the fight with improved gear.
- Use optimized strategy to reduce crystal time.
why_it_matters: - Practice or re-fight the dragon to test improved gear, or for achievement hunting.

title: Explore all major biomes
how_to_complete:
- Visit mesas, jungles, taigas, deserts, ice spikes, mushroom islands and others.
- Use maps, Elytra and boats to cover ground efficiently.
why_it_matters: - Exploring biomes unlocks rare resources, mob types and building inspiration.

title: Complete your world museum with rare blocks and trophies
how_to_complete:
- Collect dragon egg, mob heads, music discs, spawner-based trophies and decorative blocks.
- Arrange displays and label exhibits with signs.
why_it_matters: - A museum documents your world accomplishments and provides a satisfying final project.
